content: The item has no practical use, besides giving you some extra Will once sold. This is the highest rarity of Treasure and there is only one in the game.

The content is as follows:
The item has no practical use, besides giving you some extra Will once sold. This is the highest rarity of Treasure and there is only one in the game.
